content: *festive candy cane ornament for your christmas tree yarnspirations * **skill level ** beginner **materials ** caron® simply soft™ 6 oz/170 1 g 315 yds/288 m * contrast a harvest red 39763 *1 ball* * contrast b white 39701 *1 ball* 1 ball each of a and b will make approx 24 candy cane ornaments *
